name: This Website!
summary: My personal website: for recording and sharing my programming accomplishments, both personal and professional.
knowledgeGained: How to define a sensible architecture for a React.js website
How to fully launch a Node.js website, from domain name registration to hosting

name: Cocos2d-x Tiled Framework
summary: Extending utility provided by the Cocos2D-X game development platform, this framework is intended to make 2D Tile-based game development simpler. Included is a simple proof-of-concept game.
knowledgeGained: How to strictly define functions in C++
How to use valgrind to review code for memory leaks

name: Simple Ray Tracer
summary: A raytracing program for rendering three-dimensional scenes.
knowledgeGained: The fundamentals of Test Driven Development using the Catch testing library

name: String Genetic Algorithm
summary: My favorite pet project - a genetic algorithm - written in C# to familiarize myself with the popular language while exemplifying the power of genetic algorithms for machine learning in an easy-to-visualize format.
knowledgeGained: How to read and write C#.
How to utilize Visual Studio Unit Testing Libraries.

name: Memory Allocator
summary: A memory allocator, similar to that of the standard libraries, written in C.
knowledgeGained: Intimate knowledge of how memory allocation is handled by the computer
How to be proficient with pointers
How to define structs to take advantage of memory alignment
